attributes.name: rad-text
attributes.description: You can bind rad text, so combo box will show binded data instead of loading data, until user opens it.

attributes.name: rad-datasource
attributes.description: Bind this to kendo data source you've in view model.

attributes.name: rad-value-field-name
attributes.description: Property of dto to be assigned into ng-model when user selects.

attributes.name: rad-text-field-name
attributes.description: Property of dto to be displayed to user. It can be overrided using item-template. Note that this field will be used for filtering when user searchs in combo box.

attributes.name: rad-virtual-entity-loader
attributes.description: Bind this to a method which accepts args : { id : any }. At that function you should return a promise, which resolves into an entity with that id.

attributes.name: rad-on-init
attributes.description: Bind this to a method which accepts args : { comboBoxOptions: comboBoxOptions }. You can customize all aspects of your combo box there.

attributes.name: k-placeholder
attributes.description: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty.

attributes.name: k-min-length
attributes.description: The minimum number of characters the user must type before a search is performed. Set to higher value than 1 if the search could match a lot of items.

name: ng-outlet
description: The directive that identifies where the Router should render its Components.

attributes.name: ng-link
attributes.description: Title for binding a clickable HTML element to a route, via a Link Parameters Array.

name: persian-date-picker
description: This Date picker work with solar based calendar. It accepts ng-model. To configure date or date/time see is-date-time attribute.

attributes.name: is-date-time
attributes.description: Show/accept date or date time. default: false >> date only.
